text:
Switzerland, Zurich | Onsite | Frontend Angular and Typescript | Full-time

http://www.fractal-labs.com/index.html

We give shares and we're building a CFO for small and middle sized business. The founding team consists of two ex-Googlers (one engineer the other business) and we have offices in Zurich and London. We're preparing a financing round and things are getting exciting at the moment.

We're switching from Backbone and Coffeescript to Angular and Typescript and I'd be happy to explain more about it in a quick Skype call.

Hiring process:

- Two phone interviews

- Half a day onsite in our office in Zurich

Ping with your Github and / or resume to:

jobs@fractal-labs.net
